subtitles:
56813 60108 People once believed
that when someone dies...

60191 63694 A crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

64612 67990 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

68074 70576 That a terrible sadness
is carried with it...
70660 72453 And the soul can't rest.
73454 76374 Then sometimes- just sometimes-

76457 80878 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
104235 105987 I got one here!

135892 140438 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

140521 144108 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

148362 151282 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.
151365 153618 All right, guys, let's do it.

153701 156954 Devil's-fuckin'-night.
What's the count so far?
158456 160249 They're slacking off from last year.

160333 163127 Three hours to go.
Maybe they're just slow starters.
163211 164795 Corning through!

169175 172512 I really empathize, but you guys just can't
come in here and take her away like this.
172595 174055 There are procedures to stick by.

174138 176724 You guys should have
cleared this with me first.

177225 179644 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia earhart.

179727 181479 We found her, detective,
and you missed it.

181562 185358 I don't care what her name is.
I didn't give the order to move her.

185441 188069 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see
why they took away your gold shield.

188152 190238 I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
192740 194033 All right, clear outta here.

195368 197662 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

200164 203125 - Where's Eric?
-Just don't worry about him.
205378 207463 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

207547 210758 Look, I will.
You just lie back. Come on.

221102 223437 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.
223521 227483 Look, your sister- she's gonna be okay.

227567 231904 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
231988 233406 She's my friend.
233489 235491 Her and Eric.
237868 239662 You lied to her about Eric.
242164 244166 And you're lying to me about Shelly.
245668 247587 She's gonna die, isn't she?
256596 258723 Now, come on. Come on.
259473 261100 Come on. Lt's okay.
264478 265980 She's gonna be fine.

284832 288753 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

289462 291672 I used to think that was true
about everything-
291756 295676 families, friends, feelings.

296427 300181 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

300264 304685 Two people who are meant to be together-
nothing can keep them apart.
342973 344892 What are you, like, the night watchman?

367498 372962 You know, what this place needs
is a good natural catastrophe.
373045 376424 Earthquake, tornado, you know.
376507 377758 No, no, no, no. Mickey.

377842 380803 Come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
380886 383180 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
383264 385224 Hey, let me do it.

386392 390438 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

391939 393774 Don't cheap out on me.
Lots of onions.
393858 394942 Here you go.
395025 397403 There you go. All right.
397486 398988 Now we're talkin'.
400197 403200 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.
404744 406412 How do you steer that on a wet street?
406495 408581 Pure talent. Hi.

408664 412585 Sarah, she's a genuine “hot dogger.”
you hungry?

412668 414462 - You buyin'?
- I'm buyin'.
414545 416714 No onions though, okay?
418340 419925 They make you fart big time.

427850 430519 You know, lake erie
actually caught on fire once...

430603 433314 From all the crap
floating around in it.
434482 436233 I wish I could have seen that.

543632 546051 - We busted their machines!
- Boom!

568991 572411 Oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car. Cop car.
580252 582254 Bad people out on the street tonight.

588260 590888 - Damn it!
- What was that?

590971 591972 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
592973 594725 Mickey, call it in for me!
692114 693282 Department of housing!
693365 695451 Code violations?
695534 697911 Safety hazards?
697995 700164 Place looks fine to me.
700247 702207 Let's redecorate.

and felt how awful goodness is...
712551 715971 Saw virtue in her shape how lovely.”
716055 717139 lt's pornography.

787292 790170 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?
791505 793215 Look at that. Look at that.

794591 799096 Here's to devil's night,
my new favorite holiday.
799179 800681 To devil's night.
802683 804685 You go over there and tell your pals-
806061 807855 you sick fuck.

808856 811650 You're out of your
motherfuckin' mind, man.
817865 819241 Look at that!
820868 822536 Pussies drink last, man.

828584 831086 Shit ain't even loaded, man.
831170 832254 This one is.

wants to bet me this one isn't?
840804 844725 Hey! Fire it up! Fire it up!
852316 854109 Here's your shooters.
854193 855944 Put your guns away, huh, guys?
856028 857738 How ya doin', pussycat?
893607 894858 Say that again.

908580 909998 Wow, you look great.

918840 921426 - Come here!
- No, no, no!
1019441 1022069 Couple more rings. That's 24k.
1024237 1026156 It's crap. Lt's probably fake.
1026239 1028575 Leather purse. Leather.

a bloodstain that's on here?

1037918 1040504 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1040587 1043423 Now, you take it or leave it.
1044549 1046259 Right there for ya.
1047803 1050347 Decisions, decisions. Yes, right.
1052265 1055435 You cheap-ass, chrome-dome...
1055519 1059481 Child-molestin', saprophyte motherfucker.
1059564 1060941 Close the gate when you go out!
1061024 1063652 I closes up for you real good, massa.
1067614 1069783 Yeah, sit on it and twirl, you dirty scum.
1074496 1077082 Lucky I don't stab your fat ass.

1183980 1186399 What the fuck
you all painted up for, crackhead, huh?
1191571 1193740 Halloween ain't till manana.
1224396 1226982 I'll kill you! You better go!
1236616 1238743 Fuck you, murderer!

1239452 1242289 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!
1242372 1243832 What the fuck you want, man?
1243915 1246376 I want you to tell me a story.

1246459 1248670 A man and a woman
in aloft a year ago.

1249796 1252424 - You're out of your fucking mind.
- Listen!
1252507 1254718 L'm sure you'll remember.
1254801 1257470 You killed them on Halloween.

1257554 1259556 Yeah. Yeah, right.
Halloween, yeah.

1259639 1262225 Some dude, some bitch.
Whatever, man.
1262309 1264144 Her name was Shelly.
1264936 1267897 You cut her. You raped her.

1269107 1272986 I shanked her pink ass,
and she loved it!
1283079 1285165 Murderer? Murderer?

1285248 1287959 Let me tell you about murder.
Lt's fun!
1289919 1292672 You gonna learn all about it.
1297510 1299971 I'd like you to meet two buddies of mine.
1301848 1303683 We never miss.
1312734 1314944 Try harder. Try again!
1321910 1324829 Victims. Aren't we all?
1336758 1342097 Sometimes it rains inside my head
1342180 1346643 when the words run dry
1346726 1349938 the walls are breathing

1350021 1352982 look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
1353066 1354359 Yeah, it's a mess.
1359531 1361616 No, they don't have to take you

1361700 1364494 I gotta go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1364577 1369124 No, they don't have to take you away
1369207 1372544 get out of my way, you worms!
1374087 1375588 Give me some of that over there!

1377841 1381344 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.
1381428 1383179 Hey, guess what.
1383263 1386349 Arcade games fell down, went boom.
1387642 1390270 Can you imagine that? Lt's tragic.

1391146 1395316 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1395400 1398653 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.
1428725 1430143 You're thinking about the past.
1435398 1437275 Dad gave me this.
1437358 1439360 Fifth birthday.

1441780 1445450 He said. “childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.”
1460173 1461674 ls she asleep?
1469015 1470767 I think we broke her.
1476189 1479776 I love her eyes. Pretty.
1484072 1488701 No, they don't have to take you away
1496209 1499045 hey, kid, get the hell outta the road!
1517230 1518565 Don't fuck with me.
1522068 1524279 I told you to stay out of here.

1524362 1527866 Sol guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1529951 1531953 Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1532036 1533413 I don't have any dolls.
1536457 1537792 Get some food, huh?

1537876 1540920 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1546509 1549512 “Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.”
1560273 1563526 thirty, forty dollars.
1565278 1567697 Who the fuck is this now?
1567780 1571951 Hey! Piss off! We're closed!

1574746 1578625 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dust-head,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1583463 1585715 L'm gonna blow this guy's dick off.

1586674 1589677 Goddamn creatures of the night.
They never learn.

1598978 1604025 “Suddenly I heard a tapping,
as if someone gently rapping...
1604108 1606486 Rapping at my chamber door.”
1608529 1610823 what are you talking about?
1610907 1613534 You heard me rapping, right?

1613618 1617789 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1620166 1623169 L'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1624504 1627006 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.
1631344 1635098 Oh, shit. Oh, shit on me!
1636474 1639018 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1646109 1648403 Mr. Gideon. You're not paying attention.
1656452 1660373 I repeat. A gold engagement ring, yes?

1661833 1665336 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named tin tin.

1669257 1671592 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1676973 1678808 Who's this sack of shit?

1678891 1682020 That's tin tin,
one of t-bird's little helpers.
1682103 1685148 I think you can rule out accidental death.

1685231 1688026 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1688109 1692280 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1692363 1697076 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.
1697160 1699078 L'm supposed to thank you for that, right?
1699162 1702915 Word to the wise. Watch your fuckin' mouth.
1704125 1706544 What the hell do you call that?
1708546 1710173 I call it blood, detective.
1710256 1714010 I suppose you'll write it up as graffiti.

1714093 1716888 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1724979 1726522 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1726606 1729275 - Don't you know this game?
- What game are you talkin' about?
1730193 1732195 Okay, I'll tell you about the rings!

1732278 1735281 They're in that metal box!
Lt's under the shelf there!
1737366 1739285 Take 'em! Take your fucking rings!

1740536 1742288 And you can choke on them,
you son of a bitch!

1745875 1748461 - Look, it goes up to the attic.
- Okay.
1767230 1769524 It's beautiful. I don't believe it.

1793422 1796342 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1796425 1797844 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1800805 1805143 Now you're gonna tell me where to find
the rest of tin tin's little party pals.
1805226 1806853 The pit. They all hang out at the pit.

1806936 1809397 All of t-bird's little potato-heads
hang out there.
1809480 1812775 Funboy- he lives there upstairs, all right?

1817697 1820283 - A whole jolly club-
- stop! Please!
1820366 1822535 With jolly pirate nicknames!

1822618 1825246 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!

1826956 1832920 Each one of these is a life-
a life you helped destroy.
1833004 1835590 L'm begging you. Don't kill me.
1837383 1839510 L'm not gonna kill you.

1839594 1843598 Your job will be to tell the rest of them
that death is coming for them-
1852315 1855067 Tell them Eric Draven sends his regards.

1858404 1862533 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1862617 1864285 You're nothing but street grease!
You hear that?
1864368 1866746 Street grease, you motherfucker!
1866829 1868372 Is that gasoline I smell?

1890603 1893439 It's on the house, kiddo.
You know that.
1894148 1896442 One root beer.
1898611 1901155 I can't do anything.
1901239 1905701 Your mom, technically, she's off right now.
1912541 1914585 Police! Don't move!
1914669 1916796 I said, “don't move!”
1918631 1920508 I thought the police always said “freeze!”

1920591 1922927 lam the police
and I say don't move, snow white.
1923010 1924512 You move, you're dead.
1926138 1929809 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1930685 1933145 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1933229 1937566 Then shoot, if you will, officer Albrecht.

1937650 1940778 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1942655 1945866 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1945950 1949912 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1949996 1952707 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1952790 1956252 I want you to move over to the curb.
Real nice and easy.
1960423 1962091 We're gonna wait here for backup.
1962174 1964176 It's gettin' too friggin' weird for me.
1965594 1966762 Oh, it gets better.
1966846 1969348 Do you know someone named t-bird?

1972727 1973936 Like the coat?

1974020 1977273 - You're the guy that murdered tin tin.

1978733 1980192 He was already dead.

1981152 1983863 He died a year ago-
the moment he touched her.

1986365 1989368 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1990703 1991871 Get away from there!
1991954 1994623 Cops! Get outta here!
1996375 1998377 Leave it! Leave it! Run!
2003924 2007011 Oh, great. Great.

a mime from hell...

2011098 2013476 And you lose him
right out in the open.

2013559 2018439 Well, at least he didn't do that
“walking against the wind” shit.

2018522 2020816 - I hate that.
- Little early for devil's night.
2021901 2023235 What the hell is going on there?
2024820 2027656 You are very restless.

2027740 2030826 Just wish I was a little hungry again.
That's all.
2030910 2032578 Be careful of what you ask for.
2032661 2034538 Yeah, you may get it. I know.
2046550 2049637 There are energies aligning against you.
2049720 2052181 Seeing is believing, isn't it?

2071367 2075246 Gideon's pawn shop just burned down
to the foundation.
2075329 2077790 Nobody cleared this little event with me.
2077873 2080459 I didn't have nothing to do with that.

2080543 2083170 - L'm sure you must be awful disappointed.
- I got trouble.
2083254 2086590 One of my crew got himself perished.

2086674 2088968 - Who might that be?
- Tin tin.

2089051 2093597 Somebody stuck his blades in all
his major organs in alphabetical order.

2093681 2097017 Gentlemen, I think we ought to have
an introspective moment of silence...
2097101 2099520 For poor old tin tin.

2102481 2104733 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2104817 2107611 - Whatever you say. I can do.
- Good.
2107695 2109780 That's very reassuring.

2109864 2113451 I still ain't heard the story
on why Gideon's burned down.

2114660 2119165 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of god or something?
2119999 2121876 Call it my need to know.
2153824 2155993 Hey! Let me go, you creep!

2162416 2165711 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2168172 2170508 - He couldn't have stopped.
- He was a butt-face.
2170591 2172218 I could have made it.

2174136 2176222 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?
2181227 2183354 It's more like surfing than skating.
2183437 2185898 I wish the rain would stop,just once.
2187066 2188526 It can't rain all the time.

2207545 2212132 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?
2212216 2214677 Double homicide a year ago.
2214760 2216595 No convictions.
2216679 2220099 Annie, look at that.

2221100 2225437 “We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 caulderon court apartments”-
2225521 2227022 what is this, a petition?

2227106 2229441 A big “kick me” sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.
2229525 2231026 The cause got her killed.

2231110 2233612 She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2233696 2239577 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2239660 2243205 The last time you snooping on a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2243289 2247293 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2255259 2258012 You're gonna wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2260306 2264435 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2266103 2267605 I owe you one.
2297384 2301096 Tomorrow night we can get high...

2301180 2304808 And watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2330334 2332544 There's a big fuckin' bird over there.

2339885 2343472 Come here, bird.
Hey, bird. Hey, bird.
2345974 2348560 Here, birdie, birdie.
2348644 2351605 Come here, birdie, birdie, birdie.
2362449 2364410 What the fuck?

2370833 2375254 Man, don't do that!
You nearly gave me a fucking heart attack!
2375337 2377589 Look at the guy.
2377673 2379258 Don't sweat it.

2382219 2385264 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2394148 2397985 Take your shot, funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2400028 2404950 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2405033 2408579 You need professional help.
2412916 2415627 He shoots! He scores!
2425763 2428432 Jesus Christ!

2428515 2432269 Jesus Christ?
Stop me if you heard this one.
2432352 2434605 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2440694 2443489 He hands the innkeeper
three nails, and he asks-
2444698 2447075 don't you ever fuckin' die?
2447159 2448994 “Can you put me up for the night?”

2454917 2459505 - does that hurt?
- Fuck, yes, it fuckin' hurts!
2462424 2465803 Look what you've done to my sheets.
2490035 2492037 L've got a gun in my pocket.
2494873 2497751 You're happy to see me, aren't you?
2515561 2519398 Stay away! Stay away from me!

2531076 2535622 “Mother” is the name for god
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2535706 2540460 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2552097 2555684 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2587716 2591470 If l wanted ice, I would have asked for ice!
Now fill it up!
2593889 2595933 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2596016 2597684 I really need this.
2609196 2611198 You burn yourself playing with matches?

2611281 2613867 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2613951 2616411 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2616495 2619414 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2619498 2622334 Get my friend here a glass of blood.

2624127 2627339 - Hey, hon!
- Good night, Darla.
2631218 2634888 You stay put right there.
2644272 2646483 Get away, steam-head.

2678974 2682519 You can see I'm here on the corner
of 27th street and east Washington place...

2682602 2685897 The site of last year's
biggest devil's night conflagration.

2685981 2688150 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2688233 2691862 Across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2691945 2694573 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...
2694656 2696700 And cost the lives of two firefighters.

2697409 2701663 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police precinct-
2704374 2706793 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2713008 2714259 Good likeness.

2714342 2718055 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2719222 2720390 You still have your hat on.
2724269 2726396 I gotta sit down.
2736239 2740494 Are you some kind of... ghost?
2750128 2752047 I don't know what I am.
2752130 2754674 I need you to tell me what happened to us.

2756760 2760764 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2760847 2763934 She was beaten and raped.

2764017 2768605 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2768688 2771108 Come on. Read the file.

2771191 2775737 Shelly Webster held on for 30 hours
in intensive care.
2775821 2778865 Her body finally just gave it up.
2778949 2781827 I saw it. I couldn't do Jack for her.

2793380 2794798 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!
2807519 2810689 I saw her through your eyes.
2810772 2812941 You stayed with her the whole time.

2813024 2817195 Well, you gotta understand
something, all right?

2818530 2823285 I was hoping she'd come out of it,
you know...
2823368 2826288 Give me something I could work with.
2831168 2833670 why didn't you do something about it?

2833753 2837048 You think any of those people in that building-
even the ones who signed the petition-
2837132 2838884 would talk after what happened to you?
2840677 2842846 I kept asking questions...

2844055 2846683 And finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2850729 2852606 This your wife?

2852689 2857235 Yeah, we- well, not anymore.
We're getting a divorce.

2862032 2865744 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2865827 2868163 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.
2868246 2871541 Believe me, nothing is trivial.

2882219 2886806 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2891895 2894731 Are you gonna vanish
into thin air again?
2898777 2901071 I thought I'd use your front door.

2907160 2909955 I'm sorry as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2921967 2924886 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2924970 2927722 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2927806 2930892 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2930976 2933979 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.
2934062 2936773 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2936856 2941278 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.
2941361 2945031 He winked at ya? Musicians.
2946491 2947993 What else did you see?

2948076 2950996 So far I haven't heard shit about what
you're gonna do about all this crap!

2951079 2955875 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed away and went swirling.
2958169 2959921 You ain't lost everything.

2960005 2965135 Yeah? And maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Jesus!
2966011 2968805 Fair enough. Catch.

2972392 2974811 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.
2974894 2976730 Are you tellin' me this thing is real?

2976813 2980483 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2980567 2984654 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2984738 2988867 You're directly out of your fucking mind!
You know that?
2990869 2993788 Yeah. Eyes see.

2993872 2996833 It's one of the most important things
i learned from my sister.
2996916 2998543 Sister? She's supposed to be your sister?
3000253 3003590 My father's daughter. That's right.

3003673 3005383 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?
3007177 3009179 Now, let's take it from the top, friend.
3009262 3012682 With a lot of detail. What do you say?

3012766 3016311 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3016394 3019814 He told me to tell t-bird
that death was on its way.
3019898 3022108 Whatever the fuck that means.
3023026 3025945 Draven. He said his name was Eric Draven.
3027030 3029115 You wanna relax that thing now?

3029199 3033870 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3033953 3038166 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3038249 3041044 I ain't makin' all this up.
3041127 3044297 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.
3054140 3055767 A boy and his bird.
3057310 3059270 Awful touching.

3069531 3072492 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.
3081835 3084129 Funboy said he saw a black bird too.

3086673 3089008 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.
3090677 3093430 L'll have thejanitor come on up.
3157994 3162207 You again. Are you lost or hungry?
3167420 3169339 It can't rain all the time
3169422 3171424 can't rain all the time

3183061 3185772 I mean, how many times I gotta tell you?
We're in this together, or we ain't!
3185855 3187857 If one part falls, it all falls!
